I agree it would be interesting to try leaky inte=
grators in this 
domain.  Perhaps they could modulate the speed of motions.=
  However, 
a lot of the literature on leaky integrators focuses on interna=
l 
pattern generation. I'm not sure if that would be useful in this 
domain=
 since the pattern is so focused on the music itself, which is 
being input=
.  However, the motion collibration could turn out to 
look nice.  It would=
 be interesting to look at.
